page.title: 05Farming
page.content: On our farming land most farms had { {cattle}for milk or beef.In summer they graze outdoors but in winter they are indoors and so need to be fed by the farmer.Most of our area is covered by grass belonging to farms and by crops such as turnips and barley.All these are for the animals to eat in winter to keep them healthy.Our{land}has gently sloping hills which drain well and the{soil}is suitable for grass growing although the farmers have to treat it.Our{temperatures}are moderate not too hot and not too cold.Because of the industrial population of Leeds and Sheffield,there is a nearby market for our cattle produce.Other animals we saw at the farms were sheep,horses, pigs and fowl.Few farmers concentrated on arable crops only.
